definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: Zargany has taken a leave of absence amid a dispute with the region's provincial council.
sentences.chinese: 薩爾曼省長在當地的一次省級議會上請假缺席。

sentences.english: Now those that sealed were, Nehemiah, the Tirshatha, the son of Hachaliah, and Zidkijah.
sentences.chinese: 簽名的是哈迦利亞的兒子省長尼希米和西底家。

sentences.english: Owais Ghani is the top administrator of Pakistan's tribal regions as the governor of the North West Frontier Province.
sentences.chinese: 加尼是巴基斯坦西北邊境省省長。

sentences.english: Governor Zhou listened to brief introduction in Wealth Management Center.
sentences.chinese: 周強省長在財富管理中心聽取情況介紹。

sentences.english: Safe, dependable shutdown systems fit a range of engines and fuel injection pump governors.
sentences.chinese: 安全，可靠的關機系統適合各種發動機和噴油泵省長。

sentences.english: The young officers of the provincial commanders marched out of the city with the army behind them
sentences.chinese: 跟從省長的少年人出城，軍兵跟隨他們。

sentences.english: Xu told the protestors that the relocation was still in the planning stages.
sentences.chinese: 徐省長告訴上訪者說該搬遷方案尚在計劃階段。

sentences.english: We have arranged a meeting for the company with the Vice Governor.
sentences.chinese: 我們還爲這家公司約見了河南省副省長。

sentences.english: The governors said, however, that Moyles was simply keeping up with developments in English usage.
sentences.chinese: 省長說，然而，莫伊爾斯只是保持在英語用法的發展。

sentences.english: The president and some governors have the power to kill a bill by pocketing it.
sentences.chinese: 總統和一些省長有權用不予簽署的辦法否決一項議案。

sentences.english: Ampatuan Sr, the family's patriarch, has been elected governor of Maguindanao three times.
sentences.chinese: 家族族長老安帕圖恩三度當選馬京達瑙省省長。

sentences.english: Prefect Papastergiou is a very kind and warm person.
sentences.chinese: 帕帕斯特吉奧省長給人感覺很親切。

sentences.english: Dede Jusef, the vice governor of West Java is coordinating rescue efforts.
sentences.chinese: 西爪哇省副省長尤瑟夫正在協調各項救援行動。

sentences.english: Hebei’s governor finally disclosed the accident in October.
sentences.chinese: 十月份，河北省省長揭開了這一事故。

sentences.english: Guo Gengmao, member of the Central Committee and Hebei Province Governor, meets Zheng Yuanbao, Board Chairman of People Ele. Appliance Group.
sentences.chinese: 河南省長郭庚茂親切會見人民電器集團董事長鄭元豹。

sentences.english: Chen Quanguo was relieved from his post as Governor of Hebei Province.
sentences.chinese: 陳全國辭去河北省人民政府省長職務。

definition: head of provincial PRC government department
